sqlMap.select:
SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , T.* FROM ( SELECT A.PROCESS_ID , C.PROCESS_NM , COUNT(*) AS ALL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(A.REQ_PRO_TYPE,'04',1)) AS END_CNT FROM ( SELECT X.* FROM REQ4100 X WHERE 1=1
AND X.REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStDtm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND X.REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEdDtm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) A LEFT JOIN FLW1100 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID) LEFT JOIN FLW1000 C ON ( B.PRJ_ID = C.PRJ_ID AND B.PROCESS_ID = C.PROCESS_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '03' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '05' AND A.REQ_PRO_TYPE <> '06' GROUP BY A.PROCESS_ID, C.PROCESS_NM, C.PROCESS_ORD ORDER BY COALESCE(C.PROCESS_ORD, -1),A.PROCESS_ID NULLS FIRST ) T WHERE 1=1 AND T.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT A.*, B.PROCESS_NM FROM ( SELECT Y.PRJ_ID , Y.PROCESS_ID , Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM, COUNT(*) AS REQ_MM_TOTAL_CNT , COUNT(DECODE(Y.REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM,1,1)) AS REQ_ED_MM_CNT , SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (PARTITION BY REQ_ED_DU_MM) AS REQ_TOTAL_CNT FROM ( SELECT Z.*, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY') AS REQ_ED_DU_YY, TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'MM') AS REQ_ED_DU_MM, CASE WHEN Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '04' THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM IS NULL THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DTM IS NULL THEN -1 WHEN Z.REQ_ED_DTM <= TO_DATETIME(TO_CHAR(Z.REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 23:59','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REQ_ED_RATIO_NUM FROM REQ4100 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '03' AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '05' AND Z.REQ_PRO_TYPE != '06'
AND REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStDtm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEdDtm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) Y WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Y.PRJ_ID, Y.PROCESS_ID, Y.REQ_ED_DU_MM ) A LEFT JOIN FLW1000 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.REQ_ED_DU_MM, B.PROCESS_ORD

SELECT B.PROCESS_ID , B.PROCESS_NM , A.SUB_CD , A.SUB_CD_NM , COALESCE(B.REQ_CNT, 0) AS REQ_CNT FROM ( SELECT LIC_GRP_ID , MST_CD , SUB_CD , SUB_CD_NM , ORD , USE_YN , SUB_CD_REF1 , SUB_CD_REF2 , SUB_CD_REF3 , SUB_CD_REF4 , SUB_CD_REF5 , SUB_CD_DESC FROM ADM4100 WHERE 1=1 AND MST_CD = 'REQ00012' AND UPPER(SUB_CD_REF1) = 'ETC' AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Z.PROCESS_ID , Z.PROCESS_NM , Y.REQ_TYPE_CD , COALESCE(Y.REQ_CNT,0) AS REQ_CNT FROM FLW1000 Z LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRJ_ID , PROCESS_ID , REQ_TYPE_CD , COUNT(*) AS REQ_CNT FROM REQ4100 WHERE 1=1 AND PROCESS_ID IS NOT NULL AND REQ_PRO_TYPE = '04' AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND REQ_ED_DTM IS NOT NULL AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DU_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(REQ_ED_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') /* 작업종료 예정일자가 실제 작업 종료일자보다 큰것 */
AND REQ_DTM >= TO_DATE(#searchStDtm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND REQ_DTM <= TO_DATE(#searchEdDtm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
GROUP BY PRJ_ID, PROCESS_ID, REQ_TYPE_CD ) Y ON ( Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.PROCESS_ID = Y.PROCESS_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.PROCESS_CONFIRM_CD = '02' AND Z.USE_CD = '01' ) B ON (A.SUB_CD = B.REQ_TYPE_CD) ORDER BY A.SUB_CD
